name: Mami's Confrontation with Homura
expansion: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA THE MOVIE -Rebellion-
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "Unavoidable Clash" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one 《Magic》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: It seems we can read one another too well.

name: One Guided By the Law of the Cycle, Nagisa
expansion: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA THE MOVIE -Rebellion-
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 [(1)] When a card named "Bearer of Memories" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's level 3 or lower characters, put it into your opponent's memory, your opponent chooses up to one level 0 or lower character from his or her waiting room, and puts it on the stage position that character was on.
flavor_text: I'm sorry I didn't tell you until now.

name: Mami & Nagisa
expansion: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA THE MOVIE -Rebellion-
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Magic》 character, reveal it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards.
flavor_text: I put up a false bravado to be seen as a reliable senior magical girl.

name: In Top Form, Mami
expansion: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA THE MOVIE -Rebellion-
ability: 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Shift, Level 1 (At the beginning of your main phase, you may choose a yellow card in your hand and this card in your clock, and exchange them)

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)

name: Desired Direction, Mami
expansion: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA THE MOVIE -Rebellion-
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Magic》 characters.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] （When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text: I no longer have to strain to push myself past my limit.

name: One Who Knows the Truth, Nagisa
expansion: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA THE MOVIE -Rebellion-
ability: 【CONT】 If you have another character with "Mami(マミ)" in its card name, this card gets +1500 power.
flavor_text: Let me explain it from my own lips.

name: “I'm Happy Now” Mami
expansion: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA THE MOVIE -Rebellion-
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Magic》 characters.

【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, when damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may deal one damage to your opponent. (This damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: To think that a life bound by the destiny of the magical girls could be so happy.

name: Living Everyday Like a Dream, Mami
expansion: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA THE MOVIE -Rebellion-
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other "One Who Knows the Truth, Nagisa" get +500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]".

【AUTO】 Bond／"One Who Knows the Truth, Nagisa" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "One Who Knows the Truth, Nagisa" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavor_text: I believe that without Bebe, I would have given up long ago.

expansion: PUELLA MAGI MADOKA MAGICA THE MOVIE -Rebellion-

【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose another character, and that character gets +1 level until end of turn.

Madoka, you should know that even when you know how much it would hurt you, you do have the courage
to make that hard decision.
